data.title: Violin players
data.meta_description: Violinists who are remembered as active players beside being composers or teachers.
data.text:
Violinists who are remembered as active players beside being composers or teachers as well are included here. There are usually no extant recordings except approximately the last 140 years since the invention of phonograph. Contemporary players are usually included if they had public performances or published recordings. [1]

Contemporary

Violin players over eighteen years of age, preferably even over 26 years of age when their musical education is almost certainly finished are included here. One-off star kids are not included here. There are several thousand active contemporary violinists, they are listed according to geographical region. [2]

Czech Republic

Violin players from former Czechoslovakia are included.
